results.title: Always thinking of home
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Troy Lovett and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Troy Lovett’s parents divorced, he moved to Heywood which had a great Koorie population and was a great place to grow up. Lovett has since moved to Shepparton and, while he doesn’t miss the small town itself, there is a lot he misses about it.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Troy Lovett and ACMI
results.description: When Troy Lovett’s parents divorced, he moved to Heywood which had a great Koorie population and was a great place to grow up. Lovett has since moved to Shepparton and, while he doesn’t miss the small town itself, there is a lot he misses about it.

results.title: My little angel
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Chris Mansfield and ACMI
results.brief_description: Chris Mansfield introduces his daughter to the family she is about to be born into. A big family with a diverse Indigenous history, Mansfield is looking forward to his new responsibility.

results.title: Skittles
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Daniel McCrimmon and ACMI
results.brief_description: Daniel McCrimmon moved to Shepparton eight and a half years ago. He tells us of his time there, his friends, favorite places and his ambitions for the future.

results.title: Life story
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Joel Atkinson and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Joel Atkinson’s parents split up, his dad took him to Shepparton. Determined to make the most of it, Atkinson worked hard to be a good role model for his siblings.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Joel Atkinson and ACMI

results.title: Cousins
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Helen Atkinson and ACMI
results.brief_description: Helen Atkinson believes that family should always be close so you have someone to turn to when you need them the most. She shares a close bond with her cousin and wouldn’t have it any other way.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Helen Atkinson and ACMI
results.description: Helen Atkinson believes that family should always be close so you have someone to turn to when you need them the most. She shares a close bond with her cousin and wouldn’t have it any other way.

results.title: Mum and dad
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Patty Donaczy and ACMI
results.brief_description: Patty Donaczy’s parents got married in Cootamundra and made news. Despite being an interracial couple, they overlooked the prejudices of the time and embraced a future together. Their memory will live on in their children and grandchildren.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Patty Donaczy and ACMI
results.description: Patty Donaczy’s parents got married in Cootamundra and made news. Despite being an interracial couple, they overlooked the prejudices of the time and embraced a future together. Their memory will live on in their children and grandchildren.

results.title: The Great cod fisher woman
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Ramptha Edwards and ACMI
results.brief_description: Ramptha Edwards tells the story of her mother, a strong Yorta-Yorta woman who provided for her family, even if that involved moving away to work. Her skills as a fisherwoman were well known and Edwards understands that its cod that connects her to her mother’s spirit.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Ramptha Edwards and ACMI
results.description: Ramptha Edwards tells the story of her mother, a strong Yorta-Yorta woman who provided for her family, even if that involved moving away to work. Her skills as a fisherwoman were well known and Edwards understands that its cod that connects her to her mother’s spirit.
description_for_label: Ramptha Edwards tells the story of her mother, a strong Yorta-Yorta woman who provided for her family, even if that involved moving away to work. Her skills as a fisherwoman were well known and Edwards understands that its cod that connects her to her mother’s spirit.

results.title: Little Dolly : Shakira
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Daniel Edwards and ACMI
results.brief_description: Daniel Edwards’ little girl, Shakira, was born with Miller-Dieker syndrome, a congenital disorder. Edwards pays tribute to his late daughter, who he affectionately refers to as ‘Little Dolly’.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Daniel Edwards and ACMI
